mapper.sql: topo_name, group_id, stream_id, partition_value, partition_day, us_task_id, audit_source_id, audit_sink_id, audit_sink_abandon_id, audit_tag, audit_status, audit_type, sink_type, cycle_unit, receive_msg_id, send_msg_id, sink_database, sink_table, cycle_number, partition_start_ms, partition_end_ms, audit_source_cnt, audit_sink_cnt, audit_sink_abandon_cnt, retry_time, max_retry_time, msg_handler_tag, check_ratio, is_delete, create_time, modify_time
mapper.insert: insert into audit_reco_status(topo_name, group_id, stream_id, partition_value, partition_day, us_task_id, audit_source_id, audit_sink_id, audit_sink_abandon_id, audit_tag, audit_status, audit_type, sink_type, cycle_unit,receive_msg_id, send_msg_id, sink_database, sink_table, cycle_number, partition_start_ms, partition_end_ms, audit_source_cnt, audit_sink_cnt, audit_sink_abandon_cnt, retry_time, max_retry_time, msg_handler_tag, check_ratio, is_delete) values (#{topoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inLongGroupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inLongStreamId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partitionValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partitionDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usTaskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditSourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditSinkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditSinkAbandonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditTag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sinkType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cycleUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiveMsgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendMsgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{database,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{table,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cycleNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{partitionStartMs,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{partitionEndMs,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{auditSourceCnt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{auditSinkCnt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{auditSinkAbandonCnt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{retryTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{maxRetryTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msgHandlerTag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkRatio,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT} ) on duplicate key update audit_tag = values(audit_tag), modify_time = now()
mapper.update:
update audit_reco_status
retry_time = #{retryTime},
max_retry_time = #{maxRetryTime},
audit_type = #{auditType},
sink_type = #{sinkType},
sink_database = #{database},
sink_table = #{table},
cycle_unit = #{cycleUnit},
cycle_number = #{cycleNumber},
is_delete = #{isDelete},
check_ratio = #{checkRatio},
audit_status = #{auditStatus},
send_msg_id = #{sendMsgId},
receive_msg_id = #{receiveMsgId},
audit_source_cnt = #{auditSourceCnt},
audit_sink_cnt = #{auditSinkCnt},
audit_sink_abandon_cnt = #{auditSinkAbandonCnt},
audit_tag = #{auditTag},
audit_source_id = #{auditSourceId},
audit_sink_id = #{auditSinkId},
audit_sink_abandon_id = #{auditSinkAbandonId},
check_ratio = #{checkRatio},
msg_handler_tag = #{msgHandlerTag},
where group_id = #{inLongGroupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and stream_id = #{inLongStreamId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and topo_name = #{topoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and partition_value = #{partitionValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and partition_day = #{partitionDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
